name: Save Jesus
description: Someone is trying to murder Jesus. Disguised as Caesar with the Roman Empire by his side, an evil impostor from the future has set hundreds of deadly traps. Redirect the traps, kill the Romans and protect Jesus!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Video card Storage: 775 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: While it does directly rip off Angry Birds (especially with its HUD and menu interface), that's just nit-picking. It adds more to the table, and that's what counts. It's fun and funny and the challenges are well-thought out. I want to see a sequel with a slightly better budget, a few more features, and a HUD that looks a little more original. Probably Christianity-themed.  Now, this game was probably made by a non-theist as a joke, and that's just fine. Anyone who gets offended at this game needs to chill and have a sense of humor. I'm a serious Christian and this game is harmless fun. If you're secure in your se-- I mean Christianity, you should be able to make jokes and parodies about it. Then again, if you're offended at this game, you're probably just really sheltered.

Surprisingly this game was more fun than I had expected, I had more fun playing this than a few AAA titles that I won't mention.  I used to be an atheist before I played this game, but now I can proudly say I understand why the Romans did it.    8/10. Good time waster, considering the price.
Support is very quick with solving problems and answering. Game is worth the price, if you have no intention to mock Jesus then we recommend the game. The game is rated 10/10.
This game just made me believe in god again 10/10
Jesus saved you, now it's your turn to save Him.  Great graphics, good puzzles, great physics, easily worth the price. Best fifty cents i have ever spent.
I beat the game with all 3 stars and saved Jesus with my balls. He liked it very much!
when u cant find a game to play, buy this, enojoyable hour or 2
i once worshipped gaben  jesus christ was i misguided
Honestly in this game jesus dies over and over but always comes back alive by just pressing space bar. I let jesus die so i could see him fly up in the sky.

I like Jesus so I like this game! Great for the kids and really fun, my priest introduced me to this game, and ever since I have not been able to stop playing.   '10 Love does no harm to a neighbor. Therefore love is the fulfillment of the law. ' Romans 13:10

My prayers of always wanting to save Jesus from a rolling cow have been answered.  Levity aside, the game is actually a cute, level puzzle game in the vein of 'The Incredible Machine.' The game is not mocking a religion any more than Doom is mocking an army. It's a fun game, and worth the price.
He took a ball of cows to the face for our sins.
Finished half the game in .2 hours... but jesus died in the end /Jesus
good game (y) the last levels are hard  here my helpful guide         YouTube™ Video:  Save Jesus Full Gameplay All 50 Levels (No Deaths - No Commentary)

It's truly a religious experience. Divine. A truly magnificient game...   ...if you like those ♥♥♥♥♥ Mofunzone or Y8 puzzle games. Its premise is very simple. A puzzle platformer. You take away boxes and hope it either (A) Kills the enemy, or (B) Sets off a series of cluster♥♥♥♥s that hopefully kills the enemies. Pretty challenging later on.

Save jesus is by far the best game I've ever played on steam. The beautiful simplicity but potential complexity the game offers causes a blend of two of the most important features I beleive a game needs. The game has clearly been made by someone who knows what they're doing- 10/10, a must buy. Will definatly be nominating for this years Steam Awards.

A very simple game, yet funny.  Not for long gaming sessions but for de-stressing out or wasting some time.  Nice drawings, but needs more interaction with the player.
this game is too bloody for kids!!!
